lexUnit.name: tail.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the hindmost part of an animal, especially when extended beyond the rest of the body, such as the flexible extension of the backbone in a vertebrate or the feathers at the hind end of a bird

sentence.text: When Jinny went over with a bowl of water to wash her udder , she stirred restlessly , flicking her tail .
